articles.author: Julie Watson
articles.title: Elephants at San Diego safari park huddle to protect calves during earthquake - AP News
articles.description: At the San Diego Zoo Safari Park, a herd of African elephants was caught on video running over to protect their young by encircling them during a 5.2 magnitude earthquake. The elephants run as the video from the Southern California park starts to shake and th…
articles.content:
SAN DIEGO (AP) As the ground shook from a 5.2-magnitude earthquake, a herd of elephants at the San Diego Zoo Safari Park sprung into action to protect their young.
A video shot of their enclosure at… [+2267 chars]
